response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just an object; it's a symbol of excellence and craftsmanship. I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price of $18,000. I believe its worth far exceeds this amount, but I am willing to negotiate if necessary. Please let me know your thoughts on this offer. I look forward to hearing from you soon.", "product_price": 18000}
